content: such a cute little baby hat with little teddy bear ears a lovely gift for a new baby - and perfect for dolls too requires ~ dk yarn less than 30g 4mm needles instructions included for 4 sizes ~ small preemie medium preemie large preemie newborn an easy to knit hat - worked flat and seamed - and then 2 little ears sewn on so cute **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
